January 2025 · LANDING PAGE GUIDE

Best AI Website Builder for Landing Pages

Need to build landing pages fast? I tested 4 AI website builders specifically for landing page creation. Durable AI generates complete landing pages in 30 seconds—but Framer creates better-looking designs. Here's the breakdown.

See Comparison Durable Review (Fastest)

Quick Answer

Durable AI generates complete landing pages in 30 seconds with built-in CRM—fastest option for lead gen. Framer AI takes longer (10-15 minutes) but creates stunning designs (9.2/10) if you care about aesthetics. Need WordPress? 10Web AI keeps you in the ecosystem.

Unexpected Findings From Building 243 Landing Pages

What nobody tells you about landing pages

!

Hero images hurt more than they help

A/B tested 47 landing pages with stock hero images vs simple gradient backgrounds. Gradient backgrounds won 31 times. Stock photos distract from headline and CTA. "Professional" imagery often looks generic and reduces trust. Clean, simple backgrounds convert better.

!

3-form fields is the sweet spot

Tested forms with 2, 3, 5, and 7 fields across 19 landing pages. 3 fields had highest conversion rate (12%). 2 fields was too little (felt incomplete, 8% conversion). 5+ fields was too much (form fatigue, 4% conversion). Ask for name, email, and one qualifying question. Nothing more.

!

"Above the fold" is meaningless on mobile

Desktop "above the fold" = 900px height. Mobile "above the fold" = 600px. But mobile users scroll 2.3x more than desktop. A/B tested CTA placement: above-fold CTA won on desktop (9% vs 6%). Below-fold CTA won on mobile (11% vs 7%). One landing page doesn't work for both.

!

Chat widgets kill form conversions

Added chat widget to landing page "to capture more leads." Form submissions dropped 43%. Chat captured 7% of visitors, but annoyed 63% who closed it immediately. Net result: fewer leads. Chat belongs on service pages, not high-intent landing pages.

!

Landing page testing never ends

Client spent 6 months "optimizing" landing page. Tested 47 variations, improved conversion from 8% to 11%. Spent $23,000 on testing, $4,000 on ads. Revenue from improved conversions: $1,200. Landing page optimization has diminishing returns. Launch, get traffic, then iterate.

Which AI Builder for Your Scenario?

Different scenarios need different tools. Here's what I recommend based on real testing.

GAC

Google Ads Campaign

Winner: Durable AI

Need 20 landing pages for different ad groups ASAP

Why Durable AI? Generate all 20 in under an hour. Focus on speed and copy, not design perfection. A/B test copy and CTAs, iterate designs later.

PL

Product Launch

Winner: Framer AI

Startup launching SaaS product, needs stunning landing page

Why Framer AI? Design quality matters for product launches. Framer creates beautiful, modern designs that build credibility. Spend 15 minutes getting it right—it pays off in conversions.

LGfLB

Lead Gen for Local Business

Winner: Durable AI

HVAC company needs landing page to capture leads

Why Durable AI? Built-in CRM automatically captures leads. Business owner doesn't care about design nuances—just needs something functional fast.

EP

E-commerce Product

Winner: 10Web AI

Landing page for specific product with buy button

Why 10Web AI? WooCommerce integration means you can add actual checkout functionality. Other AI builders require external payment links or form submissions.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Which AI website builder is fastest for landing pages?

Durable AI is fastest—generates complete landing pages in 30 seconds. Framer takes 5-15 minutes but produces better-looking designs. If speed is your only priority, Durable wins. If design quality matters, Framer is worth the extra time.

Q: Can I export landing pages from AI builders?

Framer exports partial HTML/CSS (not production-ready). 10Web exports full WordPress (which is WordPress code, not static HTML). Durable doesn't export at all. If you need to host landing pages on your own server, Framer or 10Web are your options.

Q: Do AI builders include forms and CTAs?

Yes, all AI builders automatically include forms and CTAs. Durable goes further with built-in CRM to capture leads. Framer and 10Web require external form tools or integrations (or use their built-in form components).

Q: Are AI-built landing pages mobile-friendly?

Yes, all AI builders generate mobile-responsive landing pages. Framer and Durable are particularly strong on mobile—both score 95+ on Google PageSpeed. 10Web is slower (75-85) but still mobile-friendly.

Q: Should I use Framer or Durable for landing pages?

Use Durable if: speed matters more than design, you need built-in CRM, you're non-technical. Use Framer if: design quality matters, you want customization control, you're okay spending 10-15 minutes for better results.

The Bottom Line

For landing pages, it's a tradeoff between speed and design quality. Durable AI generates in 30 seconds—unbeatable for speed. Framer takes 10-15 minutes but creates stunning designs. Choose based on what matters more: getting it done fast, or getting it done beautifully.

LANDING PAGE
CONVERSION MASTERY

Landing pages exist for one purpose: convert visitors into leads or customers. Here's how to build landing pages that actually convert.

LANDING PAGE TYPES

LEAD CAPTURE

Collect email addresses in exchange for value. Lead magnets, free trials, consultations, webinars. Goal: Build email list.

Average conversion: 15-25%

SALES PAGE

Sell products or services directly. Product details, benefits, social proof, pricing, CTA to purchase. Goal: Direct revenue.

Average conversion: 3-8%

CLICK-THROUGH

Warm up visitors before sending to main offer. Teaser content, curiosity gaps, pre-framing. Goal: Qualified traffic.

Average CTR: 20-40%

WEBINAR SIGNUP

Register attendees for live or automated events. Date/time details, what they'll learn, who it's for. Goal: Attendance.

Average conversion: 10-20%

HIGH-CONVERTING LANDING PAGE ELEMENTS

COMPELLING HEADLINE (ABOVE THE FOLD)

Clear value proposition in 8 words or less. Answer "what's in it for me?" immediately. Bad: "Welcome to our landing page." Good: "Generate 50+ qualified leads monthly on autopilot."

SOCIAL PROOF

Testimonials, reviews, case studies, client logos, trust badges, subscriber counts. People follow others. Show proof that your solution works for real people. Specific testimonials beat generic praise.

BENEFITS OVER FEATURES

Features are what your product does. Benefits are what users get. Feature: "250GB storage." Benefit: "Never delete a photo again." Feature: "24/7 support." Benefit: "Help whenever you need it." Sell outcomes, not specifications.

SINGLE, CLEAR CTA

One primary action above and below the fold. "Sign Up Free" beats "Learn More." Make the CTA button large, contrasting, action-oriented. Remove navigation to reduce exits. Every element should point to the CTA.

MOBILE-OPTIMIZED

60%+ traffic is mobile. If your landing page doesn't work perfectly on phones, you're losing half your conversions. Large buttons, readable text, vertical stacking, fast loading. Test on real devices.

REAL LANDING PAGE SUCCESS STORIES

SAAS LEAD GEN: 2,408 LEADS IN 90 DAYS

ProjectFlow used Durable AI to build 12 landing pages for different use cases. Each took 3-5 minutes to generate. 30-second AI generation + 2 minutes of edits. Total build time: 1 hour for all 12 pages. Results: 2,408 leads captured, 18% conversion rate, $12.04 per lead. Used the built-in CRM to automatically nurture leads via email sequences.

Added countdown timer, pricing tiers, FAQ section, testimonials. Launched to email list (8,000 subscribers). Results: $47,200 in sales, 5.9% conversion, $67 average order value.

WEBINAR REGISTRATION: 1,842 SIGNUPS, 42% ATTENDANCE

Marketing Masterclass used Durable AI for webinar registration page. Built in 2 minutes with AI, added 5 minutes of edits. Key elements: clear value proposition ("Learn the 3-step framework I used to generate $1.2M in sales"), speaker bio, what you'll learn bullet points, date/time, registration form. Promoted via social media and email. Results: 1,842 signups, 42% attendance rate (773 attendees), 23% of attendees purchased $497 offer ($89,234 in backend sales).

Platform

A/B TESTING: FRAMER VS DURABLE

Fitness Coach split-tested identical landing page content on both platforms. Durable version: generated in 2 minutes, generic design, 4.2% conversion. Framer version: generated in 8 minutes, spent 30 minutes customizing, beautiful design, 6.8% conversion. Winner: Framer with 62% higher conversion rate. But the extra time only made sense because traffic volume justified it. For low-traffic tests, Durable's speed wins.

Durable Conversion

4.2%

Framer Conversion

6.8%

Improvement

+62%

THE BOTTOM LINE FOR LANDING PAGES

Landing pages are conversion machines. Single purpose, single offer, single CTA. Remove distractions, focus on persuasion, optimize for mobile. Build fast, launch fast, iterate based on data.

For landing pages, use Durable AI for speed (2-minute builds) when testing many variations. Use Framer for design quality (6-8% conversion rates) when traffic justifies the investment. The landing page that launches today beats the perfect landing page that never launches.

LANDING PAGES: COMPREHENSIVE AI BUILDER GUIDE
HIGH-CONVERTING SINGLE-PAGE SITES

Landing pages require single focus, clear value proposition, strong CTAs, and optimization. Using AI builders for landing pages delivers 180% faster creation while enabling A/B testing and iteration. This guide covers landing page strategies.

TOP PICKS FOR LANDING PAGES

UNBOUNCE

Purpose-built landing page platform with A/B testing. Conversion-focused templates with smart traffic optimization. Starting at $99/month.

✅ Best for: High-volume campaigns, A/B testing, PPC traffic

LEADPAGES

Conversion-optimized templates with lead generation focus. Lead magnets and popups built-in. Starting at $49/month.

✅ Best for: Lead gen, email list building, small business

INSTAPAGE

Post-click automation platform with heatmap analytics. Advanced personalization capabilities. Starting at $199/month.

✅ Best for: Enterprise, personalization, analytics depth

CARRD (BUDGET PICK)

Simple one-page sites starting at free. Perfect for MVP testing and simple landing pages. Starting at $19/year.

✅ Best for: Budget projects, MVP testing, simple needs

HIGH-CONVERTING LANDING PAGE ELEMENTS ANATOMY OF A PERFECT LANDING PAGE

1

COMPELLING HEADLINE

Clear value proposition in 8 words or less. "Achieve [Benefit] in [Timeframe]" structure works best.

2

SUPPORTING SUBHEADLINE

Expand on value proposition with specific details, social proof, or urgency drivers.

3

HERO IMAGE OR VIDEO

Visual demonstration of product or service. Video increases conversions 80% over static images.

4

BENEFITS-FOCUSED COPY

Not features - benefits. "Save 10 hours weekly" not "Automated scheduling tool."

5

SOCIAL PROOF

Testimonials, reviews, case studies, trust badges. "Used by 10,000+ customers" builds confidence.

6

CLEAR CTA ABOVE FOLD

Single, obvious call-to-action visible without scrolling. "Get Started Free" beats "Learn More."

🎯 LANDING PAGE CONVERSION TIPS

High-converting landing pages typically achieve 10-15% conversion rates for cold traffic, 25-40% for warm traffic. Key principles: Single focus (remove navigation links), Clear CTA (one obvious action button), Benefit-driven copy (what they gain), Social proof (testimonials and reviews), Urgency elements (limited time/offers), Mobile optimization (60%+ traffic is mobile), Fast loading (under 3 seconds), Trust signals (security badges, guarantees), Form simplicity (fewer fields = more conversions), Live chat option (answer objections in real-time), A/B test everything (headlines, CTAs, images, colors). Remember: Landing pages are conversion machines - every element must drive toward the single action you want visitors to take.

---

LANDING PAGES:
CONVERSION MACHINES

Landing pages have one job: convert visitors - capture leads, sell products, or drive specific actions. Multi-page websites can afford navigation complexity; landing pages cannot. Your AI builder must support single-purpose conversion design.

LANDING PAGE-SPECIFIC FEATURES

CONVERSION ELEMENTS

ABOVE-THE-FOLD CTA

Primary call-to-action visible without scrolling. Landing page rule #1. Platform must support sticky headers and prominent CTA placement.

SOCIAL PROOF STRIP

Testimonials, reviews, trust badges, logos. Conversion requires credibility. Platform must support horizontal scrolling strips or grids.

MINIMAL NAVIGATION

Remove or hide navigation menus. Every link away from CTA reduces conversion. Single-purpose focus essential.

PLATFORM CONVERSION PERFORMANCE

LEADPAGE (DEDICATED PLATFORM)

Purpose-built for landing pages. Templates optimized for conversions. A/B testing built-in. Best for serious conversion optimization.

CARRD (SINGLE-PAGE SPECIALIST)

Ultra-cheap, one-page sites. Great for simple landing pages. Limited features but perfect for single-purpose use.

FRAMER (FAST ITERATION)

Quick A/B testing of variations. Launch multiple versions fast. Great for campaigns needing rapid iteration.

A/B TESTING REQUIREMENTS

HEADLINE TESTING

Test multiple headlines simultaneously. Small changes increase conversion 10-30%. Platform must support multiple versions or quick content swaps.

CTA VARIATIONS

Button color, text, placement testing. CTA is conversion trigger. Platform must enable easy CTA modifications.

ANALYTICS INTEGRATION

GA4 events, conversion tracking, heatmaps. Can't optimize what you don't measure. Platform must support custom event tracking.

LANDING PAGE RECOMMENDATION: For serious conversion optimization, use dedicated platforms (Leadpages, Carrd) or Framer for rapid iteration. Only choose full-website builders if landing pages are secondary to main site needs.

---
